Row.Text: Grants free Granary for every City. Grants free Maryannu Chariot Archer. Must be constructed on Floodplains (Desert, Plains or Grassland).

"I give you, Ramessses II, constant harvests to feed the two lands at all times; the sheaves thereof are like sand, their granaries approach heaven and their grain heaps are like mountains." - inscription at Abu Simbel
